#include<cstdio>
#include<algorithm>
#include<iostream>
#include<cstdlib>
int arr[10]={0,1,6,1,6,5,6,1,6,1};
using namespace std;
int main()
{
   char abhishek[5] ;
   int i,n,sum;
   while(1)
   {
      scanf("%s",abhishek) ;
      if(abhishek[0]=='#')
        break ;
      else
      {
         n=atoi(abhishek) ;
         if(n<4)
         {
           if(n==1)
           printf("1\n") ;
           if(n==2)
           printf("5\n") ;
            if(n==3)
           printf("4\n") ;
           
         }
         
          
          else
          { sum=14 ;
           for(i=4;i<=n;i++)
           {
              sum=sum+arr[i%10];
            }
           printf("%d\n",sum%10) ;          
      } 
      }  
     
      
   }
 return(0);
}
